name: Interactive Snake ASCII Game
description: You can play the game by mouse/keyboard/touch. A remake of the classic snake game in pure ASCII by Sabin Timalsena (Lumic). I created an ASCII renderer on top of p5js, so that I could program the game using 9x16 character fonts like in MS-DOS days. This is very symbolic for me, because I made this same ASCII game in DOS/QBasic in high school, when I had first fallen in love with programming. Creating this game is like time traveling for me, and I am right back at my roots.
